sobre.title: About Me
sobre.introduction: I am from Rosario, Santa Fe Argentina. I successfully completed the Full Stack Developer career at CoderHouse in 2023. I have experience working in multidisciplinary teams and collaborating on various projects. My focus is on providing innovative and high-quality solutions to meet customer needs.
sobre.experience: I have been working as a front-end developer for over a year at a start-up, where my tasks have included modifying and enhancing user interfaces, fixing bugs, and collaborating with the backend and testing teams.
sobre.achievement1: Proficient in visual interface development and responsive design implementation.
sobre.achievement2: Successfully collaborated with back-end developers to seamlessly integrate APIs, web services, and interact with databases such as PostgreSQL across 3 to 5 projects.
sobre.achievement3: Working closely with UX/UI designers for designs created in Figma.
sobre.achievement4: Demonstrated proficiency in managing E-commerce and payment platforms.

projects.title: Star Wars API
projects.description: Working with the StarWars API to display its characters and respective movies from the saga. I demonstrated my skills in Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: MdGlobal
projects.description: The MDGlobal import and export project is a platform dedicated to simplifying and streamlining international trade processes.

projects.title: Todo Floral
projects.description: An all-encompassing e-commerce platform catering to a flower shop, event organization services, and snack sales.

projects.title: Landing TechX
projects.description: Dynamic Landing Page for TechX: Seamlessly blending animation, scroll effects, and diverse relevant information.

projects.title: Rifas El Venado
projects.description: Rifas El Venado is a full-stack project dedicated to the sale of clothing and the organization of online raffles, seamlessly integrated with Mercado Pago.

projects.title: E-commerce Store
projects.description: My first React project, an e-commerce platform powered by Firebase integration and the Fake Store API.

projects.title: Windows and Doors
projects.description: E-Commerce project leveraging Vanilla JS for dynamic DOM manipulation and Bootstrap for streamlined product addition to the shopping cart.

projects.title: Food Store
projects.description: My inaugural JavaScript endeavor, featuring a food-selling business enhanced with Bootstrap for sleek design and an integrated shopping cart functionality.

projects.title: E-Commerce Backend
projects.description: Full Stack E-Commerce Project, where I use MongoDB as the database implementing the corresponding folder architecture. Stripe is used as the payment platform.

projects.title: Farm Project
projects.description: Website programmed in Django with Python. This website will feature admin functionality, user profiles, registration, pages, and forms.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.description: To get in touch with me, please complete this form.
